summary: Samurai Genji Armor, Created by Nitiren of Oblivion, Converted by Krusty, Introduced and Uploaded by Me.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]1Vvsni9yS0E[/youtube]

This mod introduces the Genji armor from the Oblivion Mod.
Original Author is Nitiren

The full creation of this mod was done by Nitiren and most of the credit goes to him.

The Conversion of the Armor from Oblivion to Skyrim was done By Krusty, creator of the 
Dancing Crane Katana Mod and Several Items found in my Skyrim Shogun Mod.

I hope you all enjoy this fantastic piece as I believe its one of the more amazing 
Samurai Armor Mods Out there.

All Armor can Be crafted in the Steel Smithing, Perk Not Required.
These armors are Daedric Quality. Therefor I made the recipes a bit extravagent. 

Enjoy these 3 sets of Armor My gift to those who dedicate time into playing and testing
my Main Mod \"Skyrim Shogun\".

Thanks for Downloading and please Endorse. :)

For a Link to this mod and to my Samurai Clan Pack Mod see links Below.

-My Other Mod-
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29905] Samurai Clan Armor [/url]
author: Howard Anderson
